name: Polymod Sample
description:
A simple simulation built to demonstrate atomic mix'n'match modding using the Polymod library.

The default behavior is that bees will seek flowers, gather pollen, and return to the hive to deposit honey. There's no basic way to interact, it's a pure simulation.

However, this project is moddable. Four mods are included by default, and each one can be toggled on or off in combination with any of the others. Press keys 1-4 to toggle a mod on or off and reset the simulation.

1. Dragon: replace bees with dragons and flowers with livestock. Replace "Honey" score with "Meat" score. Purely a cosmetic change.

2. Double Stuff: twice as many bees and twice as many flowers.

3. Fast Flowers: flowers regenerate pollen four times faster.

4. Smart Bees: bees will seek the closest flower with the most pollen rather than seeking flowers at random.
